makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brawler
entries: The <$name$> can use its bonus action to attempt to {@action grapple} or {@action shove} a creature within its reach.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brutish Durability
entries: Whenever the <$name$> makes a saving throw, it can roll a {@dice d6} and add the result to its saving throw total.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Survivor
entries: The <$name$> regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
entries: Any hostile creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> must make an Intelligence saving throw (DC is Intelligence-based). On a failed save, a creature suffers disadvantage on all Wisdom and Charisma saving throws until the start of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Captivating Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC is Charisma-based). On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the <$name$> for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to the <$name$>'s Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The <$name$> can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed equal to its walking speed until the end of the turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The <$name$> can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lurker in Shadow
entries: While in darkness, the <$name$> is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on darkvision to see it in that darkness.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mobile
entries: When the <$name$> makes a melee attack against a creature, it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aim
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a ranged attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Focus
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the <$name$>'s focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the <$name$> drops to 0 hit points. The <$name$> can add {@dice 1d4} to attack and damage rolls against the target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Steady Aim
entries: The <$name$>'s ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover. Additionally, attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on its ranged weapon attack rolls.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The <$name$> can take an extra action on its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Arcane Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The <$name$> can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the <$name$> and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The <$name$>'s weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Potent Spellcasting
entries: The <$name$> can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: War Magic
entries: When the <$name$> uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Command Ally
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the ally can see and hear the <$name$>, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tactical Maneuver
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> targets one monster it can see within 60 feet of it. If the ally can see and hear the <$name$>, it can use its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fast Reflexes
entries: When the <$name$> takes a reaction, it can also move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Legendary Reaction
entries: The <$name$> can spend one legendary action to take a reaction, even when it has already used its normal reaction.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Reactiveness
entries: The <$name$> can take two reactions per round in combat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Break Free
entries: If the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} at the start of its turn, the effect causing this condition immediately ends on the <$name$>, and the <$name$> takes damage equal to its Challenge Rating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Freedom of Action
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against effects that would {@condition restrained|phb} or {@condition incapacitate|phb|incapacitated} it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: The <$name$> can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Legendary Durability (1/Turn)
entries: The <$name$> can choose to halve the damage it takes from an effect it can see.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Legendary Protection
entries: If the <$name$> fails a saving throw, it can spend one legendary action to succeed instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unbreakable (3/Day)
entries: If the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} at the start of its turn, the effect causing this condition immediately ends on the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Basic Mythic Monster (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it regains all of its hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exposed Weak Points (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, the damage reveals the <$name$>'s four weak points. A weak point shares the <$name$>'s AC and has a quarter of its hit point maximum. It also shares the <$name$>'s damage vulnerabilities, resistances, and immunities, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 ({@dice 1d20|+0}). If the <$name$> finishes a short or long rest, the <$name$> heals, any destroyed weak points regenerate, and the weak points are covered again. The <$name$> dies when all of its weak points are destroyed.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Permanent Transformation (Mythic Trait)
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it regains all of its hit points, and it permanently transforms into a second form. This form is immune to all conditions, has advantage on all saving throws, and deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage whenever it hits with a weapon attack. Otherwise, this form uses the <$name$>'s normal statistics.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Punishing Transformation (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it regains all of its hit points, it recharges all of its actions, it moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks, and it makes one weapon attack against the creature that reduced it to 0 hit points, if possible.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Rejuvenation (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the <$name$> dies, its body reforms at the start of its next turn, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Multi-Stage Fight (Mythic Trait; 2/Day)
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it regains all of its hit points, and it regains one spell slot of 8th level or lower, as well as one use of its Legendary Resistance feature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mythic Fury
entries: If the <$name$>'s mythic trait is active, the number of legendary actions it can take each round increases by 1 for 1 hour after using it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mythic Maneuver
entries: While the <$name$>'s mythic trait is active, it gains an additional action it can use on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Hide}, {@action Search}, or {@action Use an Object} action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mythic Reaction
entries: While the <$name$>'s mythic trait is active, it gains a special reaction that it can take once per round. The <$name$> can't use this special reaction on the same turn that it takes its normal reaction.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Variable Resistance
entries: While the <$name$>'s mythic trait is active, it gains resistance to one damage type of its choice for 1 hour after using it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dismemberment
entries: When the <$name$> takes damage equal to or greater than a quarter of its maximum hit points in a single turn, one of its limbs or body parts are destroyed.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Legendary Fury
entries: When the <$name$> is reduced to two-thirds of its maximum hit points or fewer, the number of legendary actions it can take each round increases by 1. This effect occurs again at one-third of the <$name$>'s hit points or fewer.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Legendary Movement
entries: Whenever the <$name$> takes a legendary action, it can also move up to half its speed.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Permanent Transformation
entries: When the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it transforms into or gains the statistics of another monster.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Weak Point (1/Turn)
entries: If an attack is aimed at the <$name$>'s weak point and the attack roll has advantage, the attack deals additional damage to the <$name$> equal to its Challenge Rating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Foundation of Knowledge
entries: The <$name$> can cast spells of 1st level at will, without expending a spell slot.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Improvised Action
entries: On each of its turns, the <$name$> can use a bonus action to take the {@action Help}, {@action Search}, or {@action Use an Object} action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Retooled Spell
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Spell Versatility {@recharge 5}
entries: At the start of its turn, the <$name$> can immediately swap one of its prepared spells for another spell on the artificer spell list.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Deadly Critical
entries: The <$name$> scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rage
entries: In combat, the <$name$> is raging while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the <$name$> has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and it deals one extra die of damage when it hits with a melee weapon attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bardic Inspiration {@recharge 4}
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> chooses one creature within 60 feet of it that can hear the <$name$>. Once within the next 10 minutes, the target can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Combat Inspiration
entries: While the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can play its music, allies within 30 feet of the <$name$> that can hear the <$name$> have advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Countercharm
entries: While the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can play its music, the <$name$> and any ally within 60 feet of it that can hear the <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mantle of Inspiration
entries: At the start of each of the <$name$>'s turns, each ally that can hear the <$name$> gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + the <$name$>'s Charisma modifier. This ability doesn't function while the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} or otherwise can't play its music.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC is Charisma-based) or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the <$name$> expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@scaledice 3d6|2-9|1d6} for each level above 1st.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Divine Intervention (1/Week)
entries: The <$name$> calls upon the aid of a deity or some other divine power. Roll a {@dice d100}. If the number rolled is equal to or lower than the <$name$>'s virtual cleric level, the divine power intervenes by duplicating the effects of some spell. The spell normally must be 6th level or lower, but can be higher if the <$name$> is capable of casting spells of a higher level. On a failed {@dice d100} roll, the divine power only intervenes with a beneficial spell of 4th level or lower, with targets chosen by the <$name$> as appropriate.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Healing Prayer
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can target one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target regains hit points equal to the <$name$>'s Wisdom modifier.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Nature's Wrath
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> chooses one beast or plant it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the <$name$>, the target uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the <$name$> can see.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Power of Nature
entries: Each beast and plant of the <$name$>'s choice within 30 feet of it has advantage or disadvantage (monster's choice) on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The druid can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the <$name$> can use 10 feet of its movement to magically step into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or larger.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can regain hit points equal to 10 + its virtual fighter level.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Weapons Expert
entries: A weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the <$name$> hits with it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Deft Strike (1/Turn)
entries: The <$name$> can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ki-Empowered Technique {@recharge 4}
entries: On each of its turns, the <$name$> can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Dodge} action, or to make one unarmed strike.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Martial Arts (1/Turn)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the <$name$> can choose one of the following additional effects (all DCs are Wisdom-based):

items: The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (monster's choice).
The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mental Equilibrium
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stunning Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a creature with a melee attack, it can force the target to make a Constitution saving throw (DC is Wisdom-based). On a failed save, the creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of the <$name$>'s turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Divine Fury
entries: The <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical. When the <$name$> hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Holy Vigor
entries: Whenever the <$name$> expends a spell slot, it also gains {@dice 1d8} temporary hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resolute (2/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically end one spell or hostile effect on itself and each friendly creature within 30 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unwavering
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against effects that would {@condition charmed|phb|charm}, {@condition frightened|phb|frighten}, or {@condition incapacitated|phb|incapacitate} it, as well as those that would cause it to suffer {@condition exhaustion}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hunter's Mark (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can mark a creature it can see within 90 feet of it and make that creature its quarry. The target remains the <$name$>'s quarry for 1 hour, or until either the target or the <$name$> drops to 0 hit points. While the target is marked, the <$name$> has advantage on any Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check it makes to find the target, and weapon attacks deal one extra die of damage when the <$name$> hits the target with them.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: While the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} and is in a natural or untamed environment, it and any group it is with has advantage on checks made to avoid getting lost, to detect hidden threats while traveling, to track other creatures, or to find food or other natural resources.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tireless
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against {@condition exhaustion}, poison, and being knocked {@condition unconscious}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cheap Shot (1/Turn)
entries: If the <$name$> makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target can't take reactions and has its speed halved until the end of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exploit Weakness (1/Turn)
entries: If the <$name$> makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Arcane Vigor
entries: The <$name$> can expend a spell slot to reroll a saving throw it fails. The reroll also gains a +1 bonus for each slot level above 1st. It must use the new roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Elemental Spell
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Font of Magic
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can roll a {@dice d4} and regain a spell slot of that level or lower. If it has no spent spell slots of that level or lower, nothing happens.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Quick Cantrips
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell using its action, it can cast one cantrip as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sorcerous Fortitude
entries: The <$name$> can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, it has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Beseech Patron {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can regain one spell slot.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Eldritch Ward
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mind-Eroding Hex
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically curse one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a Charisma saving throw (DC is Charisma-based). On a failed save, the target suffers disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws until the start of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Displacement {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> projects an illusion that makes the <$name$> appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the <$name$>. The effect ends if the <$name$> takes damage, it is {@condition incapacitated}, or its speed becomes 0.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Instinctive Charm {@recharge 5}
entries: The <$name$> tries to magically divert an attack made against it, provided that the attacker is within 30 feet of it and visible to it. The <$name$> must decide to do so before the attack hits or misses.

The attacker must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC is Intelligence-based). On a failed save, the attacker targets the creature closest to it, other than the <$name$> or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Teleportation
entries: When the <$name$> expends a spell slot, it can also use its bonus action to teleport up to 10 feet per level of the slot expended. It must teleport to an unoccupied space it can see.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Portent {@recharge 5}
entries: When the <$name$> or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the <$name$> can roll a {@dice d20} and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Actor
entries: The <$name$> can mimic the speech or sounds made by other creatures it has heard. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check contested by the <$name$>'s Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alert
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Spring Up
entries: While {@condition prone}, standing up only uses 5 feet of the <$name$>'s movement.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is up to half its speed and its high jump is up to a third of its speed, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sturdy Legs
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Charge
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra die of damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC is Strength-based) or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Parry
entries: As a reaction, the <$name$> adds its proficiency bonus to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the <$name$> must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dual Wielder
entries: A weapon deal one extra die of its damage when the <$name$> is dual wielding it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Elemental Adept
entries: The <$name$>'s spells ignore resistance to one of the following damage types (DM's choice): acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Grappling Expert
entries: When the <$name$> hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to automatically {@action grapple} the target (DC 10 + the <$name$>'s Strength ({@skill Athletics}) bonus) instead of dealing damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Great Weapon Master
entries: Before making a melee attack with a heavy weapon, the <$name$> can choose to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. If the attack hits, it automatically becomes a critical hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rallying Cry
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> chooses one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the ally can see or hear the <$name$>, it gains temporary hit points equal to the <$name$>'s Charisma modifier plus its Challenge Rating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lucky (3/Day)
entries: When the <$name$> makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, or when an attack roll is made against the <$name$>, the <$name$> can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Agile
entries: The <$name$> doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sure Footed
entries: The <$name$> ignores the effects of difficult terrain (or only a certain type of it).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sharpshooter
entries: Before making a ranged weapon attack, the <$name$> can choose to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. If the attack hits, it automatically becomes a critical hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shield Master
entries: The <$name$> can use its bonus action to attempt to {@action shove} a creature within its reach with its shield.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: The <$name$> can use its bonus action to attempt to {@action grapple} a creature within its reach.
